Hi all,

We are having a very strange problem. We run our test using ant Junit target
and write the results to database and update our homepage regularly. This
works fine on NT. Recently we had to upgrade our integration machine to
win2000. Now out client side tests which uses swingUI heavily always fails
because panels dont get focus and we get "Component not shown Error".

Anybody has any idea abt the way NT and 2000 handles the focus of
windows/Panels

Shailesh
